name: Mountain Climber (LoYan)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • CONTROLS:
  • WASD - Control Character
  • Up - Use Item / Climb up
  • Left and Right - Change Item / Move to the sides while climbing
  • Down - Look Around
  • OBJECTIVE:
  • Your goal is to reach the top of the 4 mountains and put your flag on the marked spots before the time limit runs out
  • ITEMS:
  • Flag: Use it on the marked spots on the mountain to gain a point
  • Apple: Eat an apple to recover energy
  • Rocket Boots: Run very fast, but lose the ability to change directions
  • Hot Drink: Remove the penalty effects from the cold temperature at great heights

Warning: Framerate is low while playing on browser, so downloading the executables is recommended
